alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Coastal Washington; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 9:46AM EST until January 30 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing Snow. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Coastal DownEast, Far Eastern, Far Northern, Interior DownEast and Penobscot Valley Maine. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause localized hazardous travel.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means blowing snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Coastal Washington; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook
